author: Kingtut 101
title: Coal Power Plant
text: A coal power plant that you can decide whether to fund it or not.  It starts as a concrete platform.  Tap it to build the power plant.

upgrades.title: Start Funding
upgrades.text: Select this to start funding the power plant.  You'll have to pay for workers and resources.

upgrades.title: Stop Funding
upgrades.text: Select this option to stop funding the power plant.  You'll still need to pay a small maintenance cost though.
